meanings.definition: Having a strong effect or influence.
meanings.sent1: The impactive speech moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent2: The impactive message resonated with the community.
meanings.sent3: The impactive story made everyone laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her impactive presence filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The impactive image left a lasting impression on everyone.

meanings.sent3: The impactive joke had everyone rolling on the floor laughing.
meanings.sent4: The impactive idea sparked a revolution in the industry.
meanings.sent5: Her impactive performance stole the show.

meanings.sent1: The impactive strategy led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent2: His impactive efforts paid off in the end.
meanings.sent3: The impactive experiment caused quite a stir in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her impactive decision saved the company from bankruptcy.
